text: Graceland is a estate and large white-colored mansion that was owned by Elvis Presley. It is located in Memphis, Tennessee, USA. ==Further reading== *Engel, Matthew. "Still stuck on Elvis, fans exalt the King". The Guardian (London), August 17, 2002, p. 1\. *Harris, John. "Talking about Graceland". The Guardian (London), March 27, 2006. == Other websites == *Official website *O.T.I.S. Odd Things I've Seen *National Historic Landmark news release *Elvis Information Network History of the building Category:Memphis, Tennessee Category:Elvis Presley Category:Buildings and structures in Tennessee
title: Graceland
